CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 31, 1945, pg. 26 reads: " Vets Entertained - A gala time was had by veterans of Deshon Hospital last Wednesday evening, when they were entertained by the Kay Junior Hostesses. Pool, dancing and games formed the program.  The hostesses also served a tasty repast.  Miss Anna Kemp is president of the hostess group who provide an entertainment for the Deshon veterans the first and third Wednesdays at the Kay Boys Club. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of the Kay Junior Hostesses, including woman wearing dark dress with light colored floral applique, and veterans of the Deshon Hospital wearing army uniforms, gathered in Kay Boys Club
